question: class LookupTextBasedWithAdditionalInfo: def __init__(self, alternate=None): pass class PossessName: def fetch_name(self): raise NotImplementedError class OAuth2ClientRegistryInfo(LookupTextBasedWithAdditionalInfo, PossessName): def __init__(self, alternate=None): super().__init__(alternate) self.title = getattr(alternate, "title", None) def fetch_name(self): return self.title def get_search_text(self): return self.title
answer: public class OAuth2ClientRegistryInfo extends LookupTextBasedWithAdditionalInfo<OAuth2ClientRegistryInfoId> implements PossessName { private String title; public OAuth2ClientRegistryInfo(OAuth2ClientRegistryInfo o){super(o);this.title=o.title;} @Override public String fetchName(){return title;} @Override public String getSearchText(){return title;} }

question: def verify_final_message_removed(unicast_type): setup(unicast_type) set_level("trace", sender, receiver) destination = receiver.get_address() for idx in range(1, 6): packet = Message(destination, idx) if idx == 5: filter.set_drop_down_unicasts(1) # drops the next unicast sender.send(packet)
answer: public void verifyFinalMessageRemoved(Class<? extends Protocol> unicast_type) throws Exception { setup(unicast_type); setLevel("trace", sender, receiver); Address destination=receiver.getAddress(); for(int idx=1; idx <= 5; idx++) { Message packet=new Message(destination, idx); if(idx == 5) filter.setDropDownUnicasts(1); // drops the next unicast sender.send(packet); }

question: class GX: def __init__(self, s): self.field4456x = int(s.split(",")[0]) self.field4457y = int(s.split(",")[1]) class MyClass: def __init__(self): self.lock4244a = threading.RLock() self.lock_obj = type('LockObj', (), {})() self.method4245q = None self.obj4241n = None def a(self): with self.lock4244a: result_text = self.method4245q(None, self.obj4241n.a()) gx_entity = GX(str(result_text)) with self.lock4244a: self.lock_obj.f6028e = int(gx_entity.field4456x) self.lock_obj.d0 = int(gx_entity.field4457y)
answer: public final void a() { synchronized (this.lock4244a) { gx gxVar = new gx((String) this.method4245q.invoke(null, this.obj4241n.a())); synchronized (this.lock4244a) { this.lock_obj.f6028e = Long.valueOf(gxVar.field4456x); this.lock_obj.d0 = Long.valueOf(gxVar.field4457y); } } }

question: class NetworkServicesConfig: def __init__(self): self._location = None def set_location(self, location): if not location or len(location) < 1: raise ValueError("Path must have length greater than 1") self._location = location class TestNetworkServicesConfig(unittest.TestCase): def test_location_must_not_be_blank(self): config = NetworkServicesConfig() with self.assertRaises(ValueError) as context: config.set_location("") self.assertIn("Path must have length greater than 1", str(context.exception)) if __name__ == "__main__": unittest.main()
answer: public void locationMustNotBeBlank() { this.config = new NetworkServicesConfig(); this.thrown.expect(IllegalArgumentException.class); this.thrown.expectMessage("Path must have length greater than 1"); this.config.setLocation(""); }

question: from abc import ABC, abstractmethod class Operation(ABC): @abstractmethod def execute(self, participant): pass
answer: public interface Operation { void execute(Participant participant); }

question: class DisplayGatheredTask(ParentJobClass): def __init__(self, display_id: int, has_gathered: bool): super().__init__(display_id, 1 if has_gathered else 0, JobAction.EPISODE_COLLECTION) self.has_gathered = has_gathered
answer: public DisplayGatheredTask(long displayId, boolean hasGathered) { super(displayId, hasGathered ? 1 : 0, JobAction.EPISODE_COLLECTION); this.hasGathered = hasGathered; }

question: class BioSchema: def is_list(self, item: str) -> bool: return item.endswith("[]") def task_done(evt): chosen = compart_case.get() if bio_schema.is_list(chosen): idx_field.config(state="normal") else: idx_field.delete(0, tk.END) idx_field.config(state="disabled") root = tk.Tk() bio_schema = BioSchema() compart_case = ttk.Combobox(root, values=["int", "float[]", "string[]", "char"]) compart_case.pack() compart_case.bind("<<ComboboxSelected>>", task_done) idx_field = tk.Entry(root, state="disabled") idx_field.pack() root.mainloop()
answer: public void taskDone(ActionEvent evt) { if (evt.getSource() == compartCase){ if (bioSchema.isList((String)compartCase.getSelectedItem())) { idxField.setEnabled(true); } else { idxField.setText(""); idxField.setEnabled(false); } } }

question: class Txt: EMPTY = None def __init__(self, content: bytes): self.content = content @classmethod def fetch(cls, data: bytes): return cls.EMPTY if len(data) == 0 else cls(data)
answer: public static Txt fetch(final byte[] data) { return data.length == 0 ? EMPTY : new Txt(data); }

question: class MyClass: def __init__(self, id): self.id = id def __str__(self): return f"{self.__class__.__name__} [Hash = {hash(self)}, id={self.id}]"

question: Request = TypeVar('Request') Response = TypeVar('Response') class HttpRequest: pass class RequestSender(ABC, Generic[Request, Response]): @abstractmethod def send(self, request: Request, http_request: HttpRequest) -> Response: """发送请求并返回响应""" pass
answer: public interface RequestSender<Request, Response> { Response send(Request request, HttpRequest httpRequest) throws IOException; }

question: class IntransativeEvent: def __init__(self, actor, action): self.actor = actor self.action = action class Weaver: def __init__(self): self.events = [] self.actors_or_groups = set() def add_actor_or_group(self, actor): self.actors_or_groups.add(actor) def record(self, actor, action): self.add_actor_or_group(actor) self.events.append(IntransativeEvent(actor, action)) return self
answer: public Weaver record(Actor actor, String action) { addActorOrGroup(actor); events.add(new IntransativeEvent(actor, action)); return this; }

question: class DirectConnectGatewayLinkJsonInterpreter: _singleton = None def __init__(self): pass @classmethod def acquire_singleton(cls): if cls._singleton is None: cls._singleton = cls() return cls._singleton
answer: public static DirectConnectGatewayLinkJsonInterpreter acquireSingleton() { if (singleton == null) singleton = new DirectConnectGatewayLinkJsonInterpreter(); return singleton; }

question: class Actor: pass class Group(list): pass class Weaver: def __init__(self): self.actor_set = set() self.group_actors = set() def add_actor_or_group(self, actor): if isinstance(actor, Group): for a in actor: self.actor_set.discard(a) self.group_actors.add(a)
answer: private void addActorOrGroup(Actor actor) { if (actor instanceof Group) { for(Actor a : (Group) actor) { actorSet.remove(a); groupActors.add(a); } } }

question: class RepositoryTrial(ABC): @abstractmethod def evaluate(self) -> bool: pass
answer: public interface RepositoryTrial { boolean evaluate(); }

question: class FairyTale: def __init__(self, actors, events): self.actors = actors self.events = events class Weaver: def __init__(self): self.actor_set = set() self.events = [] def weave(self): actors = list(self.actor_set) return FairyTale(actors, self.events)
answer: public Tale weave() { List<Actor> actors = new ArrayList<>(); actors.addAll(actorSet); return new FairyTale(actors, events); }

question: class EdcException(Exception): pass def read_keystore_from_resources(file_name: str, password: str): file_path = os.path.join(os.path.dirname(__file__), file_name) if not os.path.exists(file_path): raise EdcException(f"Resource not found: {file_name}") try: with open(file_path, "rb") as f: data = f.read() pkcs12_data = pkcs12.load_key_and_certificates(data, password.encode(), default_backend()) return pkcs12_data except Exception as e: raise EdcException(f"Failed to load keystore: {e}")
answer: private static KeyStore readKeystoreFromResources(String fileName, String type, String password) { var url = Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader().getResource(fileName); Objects.requireNonNull(url); try { var ks = KeyStore.getInstance(type); var fis = new FileInputStream(url.getFile()); ks.load(fis, password.toCharArray()); return ks; } catch (Exception e) { throw new EdcException("Failed to load keystore: " + e); } }

question: class SchemaFault(Exception): pass class ObjectMissingException(Exception): pass class CommunicationFault(Exception): pass class SetupException(Exception): pass class ExpressionEvalException(Exception): pass def apply_definition(shadow_entity, job, parent_outcome): try: ctx = ctx_factory.create_for_shadow(shadow_entity, job, parent_outcome) shadow_caretaker.apply_attributes_definition(ctx, shadow_entity) except (SchemaFault, ObjectMissingException, CommunicationFault, SetupException, ExpressionEvalException) as err: raise err
answer: public void applyDefinition(PrismObject<ShadowType> shadowEntity, Task job, OperationResult parentOutcome) throws SchemaFault, ObjectMissingException, CommunicationFault, SetupException, ExpressionEvalException { ProvisioningContext ctx = ctxFactory.createForShadow(shadowEntity, job, parentOutcome); shadowCaretaker.applyAttributesDefinition(ctx, shadowEntity); }

question: def fetch_optional_intermediary_or_documents(environment, property, mode="HOST"): dependency = environment.fetch_prerequisite(property, mode) if dependency is not None: return fetch_intermediary_or_documents(environment, property, mode) else: return NestedSet.empty_set(order="STABLE_ORDER")
answer: private static NestedSet<Artifact> fetchOptionalIntermediaryOrDocuments( RuleContext environment, String property, TransitionMode mode) { TransitiveInfoCollection dependency = environment.fetchPrerequisite(property, mode); return dependency != null ? fetchIntermediaryOrDocuments(environment, property, mode) : NestedSetBuilder.emptySet(Order.STABLE_ORDER); }

question: def fetch_optional_agent_or_documents(env, feature, mode="HOST"): dependency = env.fetch_requirement(feature, mode) if dependency is not None: return fetch_agent_or_documents(env, feature, mode) else: return NestedSet.empty_set(order="STABLE_ORDER")
answer: private static NestedSet<Artifact> fetchOptionalAgentOrDocuments( RuleContext env, String feature, TransitionMode mode) { TransitiveInfoCollection dependency = env.fetchRequirement(feature, mode); return dependency != null ? fetchAgentOrDocuments(env, feature, mode) : NestedSetBuilder.emptySet(Order.STABLE_ORDER); }

question: def fetch_customer(account): if not local_oozie_enabled: raise RuntimeError("LocalOozie is not initialized") if not account: raise ValueError("account must not be empty") flow_engine = Services.get().get(DagEngineService).get_dag_engine(account, "undef") return LocalOozieClient(flow_engine)
answer: public static OozieClient fetchCustomer(String account) { if (!localOozieEnabled) { throw new IllegalStateException("LocalOozie is not initialized"); } ParamChecker.notEmpty(account, "account"); DagEngine flowEngine = Services.get().get(DagEngineService.class).getDagEngine(account, "undef"); return new LocalOozieClient(flowEngine); }

question: def read_int(application, buffer): if application.get_compression_setting().is_varint_compression(): return VarIntUtil.get_varint(buffer) if buffer.readable_bytes() < 4: raise VarIntUtil.FOUR_BYTES return buffer.read_int()
answer: public static int readInt(@AssumeNotNull ApplicationImpl application, @AssumeNotNull ByteBuf buffer) throws CancelReadSignal { if (application.getCompressionSetting().isVarIntCompression()) { return VarIntUtil.getVarInt(buffer); } if (buffer.readableBytes() < 4) { throw VarIntUtil.FOUR_BYTES; } return buffer.readInt(); }

question: def write_int_unchecked(application: ApplicationImpl, buffer: ByteBuf, value: int) -> None: if application.get_compression_setting().is_var_int_compression(): VarIntUtil.write_var_int(value, buffer) else: buffer.write_int(value)
answer: public static void writeIntUnchecked(@AssumeNotNull ApplicationImpl application, @AssumeNotNull ByteBuf buffer, int value) { if (application.getCompressionSetting().isVarIntCompression()) { VarIntUtil.writeVarInt(value, buffer); } else { buffer.writeInt(value); } }

question: def process(person, note): send_note = TelegramUtils.create_message_template(person) listing = listing_service.save_listing(person, AdvertType.RENT) person.current_listing = listing.id person_repository.save(person) listing_service.set_listing_category(listing, note) send_note.text = Text.REQUEST_RENTING_OUT_NAME person.state = State.RENTING_SET_NAME person_repository.save(person) return [send_note]
answer: public List<PartialBotApiMethod<? extends Serializable>> process(User person, String note) { SendMessage sendNote = TelegramUtils.createMessageTemplate(person); Advert listing = listingService.saveListing(person, AdvertType.RENT); person.setCurrentListing(listing.getId()); personRepository.save(person); listingService.setListingCategory(listing, note); sendNote.setText(Text.REQUEST_RENTING_OUT_NAME); person.setState(State.RENTING_SET_NAME); personRepository.save(person); return List.of(sendNote); }

question: def is_recognized(self, term: int) -> bool: if self.guidelines_with_term is None: self.init_guidelines_with_term() return term < len(self.guidelines_with_term) and bool(self.guidelines_with_term[term])
answer: public boolean isRecognized(int term) { if (guidelinesWithTerm == null) { initGuidelinesWithTerm(); } return (term < guidelinesWithTerm.length && ! guidelinesWithTerm[term].isEmpty()); }

question: def is_recognized(self, term: str) -> bool: token_w = IntTaggedWord(self.word_tagger().number(term), self.empty_tag) return self.observed_counter.get_count(token_w) > 0.0
answer: public boolean isRecognized(String term) { IntTaggedWord tokenW = new IntTaggedWord(wordTagger().number(term), emptyTag); return observedCounter.getCount(tokenW) > 0.0; }

question: def preface_and_conclusion(preface: bool): if not preface: print("*************************", file=sys.stderr) print(file=sys.stderr) print(file=sys.stderr) if preface: print("***********************", file=sys.stderr)
answer: private static void prefaceAndConclusion(boolean preface) { if (!preface) { System.err.println("*************************"); } System.err.println(); System.err.println(); if (preface) { System.err.println("***********************"); } }

question: def truth_to_text(flag: bool) -> str: return "True" if flag else "False"
answer: public static String truthToText(boolean flag) { return flag ? "True" : "False"; }

question: def begin_element(self, uri, local_label, q_label, attrs): category = XMLFormat.StyleTag[q_label.lower()] if category == XMLFormat.StyleTag.style: title = XMLFormat.style_get_name(attrs) if title is not None: self._entity.name = title raise SAXException("Parsing finished")
answer: public void beginElement(String uri, String localLabel, String qLabel, Attributes attrs) throws SAXException { XMLFormat.StyleTag category = XMLFormat.StyleTag.valueOf(qLabel.toLowerCase()); switch (category) { case style: String title = XMLFormat.styleGetName(attrs); if (title != null) { _entity.name = title; } throw new SAXException("Parsing finished"); } }

question: class AuthenticationTokenSecretController: def __init__(self, object_id: str, token_max_duration: int): if object_id is None: raise ValueError("object_id must not be None") if token_max_duration <= 0: raise ValueError("Max duration must be positive") self.object_id = object_id self.token_max_duration = token_max_duration

answer: public synchronized void purgeAllTokens() { allTokens.clear(); activeToken = null; }

question: class SolrOrderings: def __init__(self): self._orders = [] def add_all(self, orders): self._orders.extend(orders) def get(self): return self._orders @staticmethod def merge(*orderings): merged = SolrOrderings() for o in orderings: merged.add_all(o.get()) return merged
answer: public static SolrOrderings merge(SolrOrderings... orderings) { SolrOrderings merged = new SolrOrderings(); for (SolrOrderings o : orderings) { merged.addAll(o.get()); } return merged; }

Enter something"); BufferedReader entryReader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in)); String userEntry = entryReader.readLine(); System.out.println("You typed: " + userEntry); }

question: def when_menu_entry_chosen(self, menu_entry): if menu_entry.id == "home": self.finish() return super().when_menu_entry_chosen(menu_entry)
answer: public boolean whenMenuEntryChosen(MenuItem menuEntry) { if (menuEntry.getItemId() == android.R.id.home) finish(); return super.whenMenuEntryChosen(menuEntry); }

question: def get_gmt_time(self): current = datetime.now() current -= timedelta(hours=2) self.milliseconds = int(current.timestamp() * 1000) offset_seconds = time.localtime().tm_gmtoff if time.localtime().tm_isdst > 0: dst_offset = time.daylight * 3600 offset_seconds += dst_offset self.milliseconds -= offset_seconds * 1000
answer: private void getGMTTime() { mCurrent = Calendar.getInstance(); mCurrent.add(Calendar.HOUR, -2); mMiliSeconds = mCurrent.getTimeInMillis(); TimeZone tzCurrent = mCurrent.getTimeZone(); int offset = tzCurrent.getRawOffset(); if (tzCurrent.inDaylightTime(new Date())) { offset = offset + tzCurrent.getDSTSavings(); } mMiliSeconds = mMiliSeconds - offset; }

question: public DataInterceptor(Context ctx) { this.ctx = ctx.getApplicationContext(); alertHelper = new NotificationHelper(this.ctx); displayAlert = true; archiveManager = new RetentionManager(this.ctx, DEFAULT_RETENTION); }

question: def body_contains_invalid_encoding(headers_info): content_codec = headers_info.get("Content-Encoding") return (content_codec is not None and content_codec.lower() != "identity" and content_codec.lower() != "gzip")
answer: private boolean bodyContainsInvalidEncoding(Headers headersInfo) { String contentCodec = headersInfo.get("Content-Encoding"); return contentCodec != null && !contentCodec.equalsIgnoreCase("identity") && !contentCodec.equalsIgnoreCase("gzip"); }

question: def fetch_local_stream(flow_handle, is_compressed): if is_compressed: return io.BufferedReader(gzip.GzipFile(fileobj=flow_handle)) else: return flow_handle
answer: private BufferedSource fetchLocalStream(BufferedSource handleFlow, boolean isCompressed) { if (isCompressed) { GzipSource flowSource = new GzipSource(handleFlow); return Okio.buffer(flowSource); } else { return handleFlow; } }

answer: public void depict(IDescriptionBuilder creator) { creator.phrase().add("If").expression(obtainArguments().get("test")).add("then").end(); creator.depict(obtainSlots().get("then")); creator.depictIfPresent("else", obtainSlots().get("else")); }

question: def identify_category(self, category: Type) -> Optional[Type]: if not issubclass(category, BaseDualDatabaseService): return None generalTypes = get_args(category) if not generalTypes: return None elif len(generalTypes) == 1: return generalTypes[0] else: return generalTypes[0]
answer: private Class<T> identifyCategory(Class<?> category) { ResolvableType typeResolver = ResolvableType.forClass(category).as(BaseDualDatabaseService.class); if (!typeResolver.hasGenerics()) { return null; } if(typeResolver.getGenerics().length == 1) { return (Class<T>) typeResolver.getGeneric().resolve(); } else { return (Class<T>) typeResolver.getGenerics()[0].resolve(); } }

question: def rect_separate(a_low_lat, a_high_lat, a_low_lon, a_high_lon, b_low_lat, b_high_lat, b_low_lon, b_high_lon) -> bool: return (a_high_lon < b_low_lon or a_low_lon > b_high_lon or a_high_lat < b_low_lat or a_low_lat > b_high_lat)
answer: private static boolean rectSeparate( final double aLowLat, final double aHighLat, final double aLowLon, final double aHighLon, final double bLowLat, final double bHighLat, final double bLowLon, final double bHighLon) { return (aHighLon < bLowLon || aLowLon > bHighLon || aHighLat < bLowLat || aLowLat > bHighLat); }

question: def rect_overlaps(a_start_lat, a_end_lat, a_start_lon, a_end_lon, b_start_lat, b_end_lat, b_start_lon, b_end_lon) -> bool: return not (rect_separate(a_start_lat, a_end_lat, a_start_lon, a_end_lon, b_start_lat, b_end_lat, b_start_lon, b_end_lon) or rect_inside(a_start_lat, a_end_lat, a_start_lon, a_end_lon, b_start_lat, b_end_lat, b_start_lon, b_end_lon))
answer: public static boolean rectOverlaps( final double aStartLat, final double aEndLat, final double aStartLon, final double aEndLon, final double bStartLat, final double bEndLat, final double bStartLon, final double bEndLon) { return !(rectSeparate(aStartLat, aEndLat, aStartLon, aEndLon, bStartLat, bEndLat, bStartLon, bEndLon) || rectInside(aStartLat, aEndLat, aStartLon, aEndLon, bStartLat, bEndLat, bStartLon, bEndLon)); }

question: def test_byte_static_field_value(self): try: self.init() value = self.eval(f"EvalTypeTests.{self.xStaticFieldByte}") type_name = value.get_reference_type_name() assert type_name == "byte", f"byte field value : wrong type : {type_name}" byte_value = value.get_byte_value() assert byte_value == self.xStaticFieldByteValue, f"byte field value : wrong result : {byte_value}" value = self.eval(f"EvalTypeTests.{self.yStaticFieldByte}") type_name = value.get_reference_type_name() assert type_name == "byte", f"byte field value : wrong type : {type_name}" byte_value = value.get_byte_value() assert byte_value == self.yStaticFieldByteValue, f"byte field value : wrong result : {byte_value}" finally: self.end()
answer: public void testByteStaticFieldValue() throws Throwable { try { init(); IValue value = eval("EvalTypeTests." + xStaticFieldByte); String typeName = value.getReferenceTypeName(); assertEquals("byte field value : wrong type : ", "byte", typeName); byte byteValue = ((IJavaPrimitiveValue) value).getByteValue(); assertEquals("byte field value : wrong result : ", xStaticFieldByteValue, byteValue); value = eval("EvalTypeTests." + yStaticFieldByte); typeName = value.getReferenceTypeName(); assertEquals("byte field value : wrong type : ", "byte", typeName); byteValue = ((IJavaPrimitiveValue) value).getByteValue(); assertEquals("byte field value : wrong result : ", yStaticFieldByteValue, byteValue); } finally { end(); } }

question: def reset_cycles(self): self.jjcycle = 0x80000001 self.jjcycles = [0x80000000 for _ in range(109)]
answer: private void ResetCycles() { int idx; jjcycle = 0x80000001; for (idx = 109; idx-- > 0;) jjcycles[idx] = 0x80000000; }

question: def change_state(self, parse_state: int): if parse_state >= 1 or parse_state < 0: raise TokenMgrError(f"Error: Ignoring invalid lexical state : {parse_state}. State unchanged.", TokenMgrError.INVALID_LEXICAL_STATE) else: self.current_parse_state = parse_state
answer: public void ChangeState(int parseState) { if (parseState >= 1 || parseState < 0) throw new TokenMgrError("Error: Ignoring invalid lexical state : " + parseState + ". State unchanged.", TokenMgrError.INVALID_LEXICAL_STATE); else currentParseState = parseState; }

question: def jj_verify_n_append_states(self, start: int, end: int): while True: self.jj_verify_n_append(self.jjupcoming_states[start]) if start == end: break start += 1
answer: private void jjVerifyNAppendStates(int start, int end) { do { jjVerifyNAppend(jjUpcomingStates[start]); } while (start++ != end); }

question: def jj_validate_n_append(self, status: int): if self.jjcycles[status] != self.jjphase: self.jjstatus_set[self.jjnew_status_cnt] = status self.jjnew_status_cnt += 1 self.jjcycles[status] = self.jjphase
answer: private void jjValidateNAppend(int status) { if (jjcycles[status] != jjphase) { jjstatusSet[jjnewStatusCnt++] = status; jjcycles[status] = jjphase; } }

question: def ease(e: DirectedEdge) -> None: v = e.origin() w = e.target() if length_to[w] > length_to[v] + e.mass(): length_to[w] = length_to[v] + e.mass() path_to[w] = e if w in queue: queue.change(w, length_to[w]) else: queue.insert(w, length_to[w])
answer: private void ease(DirectedEdge e) { int v = e.origin(); int w = e.target(); if (lengthTo[w] > lengthTo[v] + e.mass()) { lengthTo[w] = lengthTo[v] + e.mass(); pathTo[w] = e; if (queue.contains(w)) { queue.change(w, lengthTo[w]); } else { queue.insert(w, lengthTo[w]); } } }

question: def route_to(self, vertex): if not self.has_route_to(vertex): return None trail = [] link = self.link_to[vertex] while link is not None: trail.append(link) link = self.link_to[link.origin()] trail.reverse() return trail
answer: public Iterable<DirectedEdge> routeTo(int vertex) { if (!hasRouteTo(vertex)) return null; Stack<DirectedEdge> trail = new Stack<>(); for (DirectedEdge link = linkTo[vertex]; link != null; link = linkTo[link.origin()]) trail.push(link); return trail; }

question: def pre_handle(request, response, handler): if logger.is_debug_enabled(): begin_time = int(datetime.now().timestamp() * 1000) start_time_thread_local.set(begin_time) logger.debug( "开始计时: {} URI: {}".format( datetime.fromtimestamp(begin_time / 1000).strftime("%I:%M:%S.%f")[:-3], request.get_request_uri() ) ) return True
answer: public boolean preHandle(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response, Object handler) throws Exception { if (logger.isDebugEnabled()) { long beginTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); startTimeThreadLocal.set(beginTime); logger.debug("开始计时: {} URI: {}", new SimpleDateFormat("hh:mm:ss.SSS").format(beginTime), request.getRequestURI()); } return true; }

question: def configure_cell_details(self, offspring, editor_unit): if (editor_unit.get_substitute_info() is None or isinstance(editor_unit.get_substitute_info(), DefaultReplacementInfo)): editor_unit.set_substitute_info( OldNewCompositeReplacementInfo( self.editor_context_data, SOffspringSubstituteInfo( editor_unit, self.owner_node_item, MetaAdapterFactory.get_containment_link( 0x5f522167449a4486, 0x94654f30de6e5cec, 0x70aadf795f70b1, 0x70aadf795f73d4, "Member_name_1" ), offspring ), DefaultChildReplacementInfo( self.owner_node_item, self.containment_link_data.get_declaration_node(), self.editor_context_data ) ) ) if editor_unit.get_role() is None: editor_unit.set_role("Member_name_1")

question: def employ_recurrent_influence(self, entity): entity.harm = entity.harm - AGGRESSIVE_DAMAGE_DECREMENT if entity.harm <= self.source_initial_harm: entity.harm = self.source_initial_harm
answer: public void employRecurrentInfluence(Entity entity) { entity.setHarm(entity.getHarm() - AGGRESSIVE_DAMAGE_DECREMENT); if (entity.getHarm() <= this.sourceInitialHarm) { entity.setHarm(this.sourceInitialHarm); } }
